title: Welcome to Parima's Blog
snippet: Welcome to my blog!For a while, I’ve wanted to start a blog. This is is a great platform to share my thoughts and what I’ve been upto. More recently, I’ve been develing into a deeper study of engineering management, process, MLOps, infrastructure, storytelling, communication, philosophy and a whole host of other subjects.Come and join me as I read, learn, develop, and grow!
